abstract: STMicroelectronics and Intel announced a delay in the merger of their unprofitable memory units.
snippet: STMicroelectronics and Intel announced a delay in the merger of their unprofitable memory units.
lead_paragraph: STMicroelectronics and Intel announced a delay Wednesday in the merger of their unprofitable memory units and said banks would commit less start-up financing to the venture than previously announced.

headline.main: Chip Makers Delay a Merger of Their Memory Divisions
headline.print_headline: Chip Makers Delay a Merger Of Their Memory Divisions
